qr = QuantumRegister(3, name='q')
cr = ClassicalRegister(3, name='cr')
qc = QuantumCircuit(qr, cr)

qc.h(0)

qc.h(1)

qc.h(2)

## Begin Oracle
qc.x(0)
qc.x(1)
qc.x(2)
qc.h(2)
qc.mcx(list(range(2)), 2)
qc.h(2)
qc.x(0)
qc.x(1)
qc.x(2)
## End Oracle
